description: This file contains manually curated events to add to the timeline. Add your own events here following the schema below. Delete or modify the example events as needed.

schema.title: string (required)
schema.precision: float (required) - higher values indicate more precise dates (e.g., 1.0 for day, 0.5 for month, 0.1 for year)
schema.weight: integer (required) - duration in days, used for display priority
schema.url: string (required) - source URL for the event
schema.span_match_notes: string (required) - notes about how the date was determined

events.title: Example: First human on Mars
events.description: Hypothetical future event for demonstration purposes

events.title: Example: Signing of the Magna Carta
events.description: Charter of rights agreed to by King John of England
